description: The Samastipur RTO (BR-33) serves as the primary motor vehicle regulatory body for the Samastipur district in Bihar, operating under the Darbhanga administrative division. It manages vital services including vehicle registration, issuance of driving licenses, and enforcement of transport regulations across its extensive jurisdiction. The office is central to the transport infrastructure of the region, which is a major agricultural hub and a significant junction for the East Central Railway.
address: District Transport Office, Collectorate Building, Uttarayan, Kasipur, Samastipur, Bihar
